name: Credit Risk
description: Expertise in credit risk modeling, policy development, and portfolio analytics for retail and SME segments. Experienced in applying data-driven approaches to assess borrower creditworthiness and reduce non-performing loans (NPLs).

name: Data Analytics
description: Proficient in transforming raw data into actionable insights through advanced analytical techniques. Skilled in data cleaning, feature engineering, and visualization to support data-driven decision-making.

name: Data Science
description: Experienced in designing and deploying machine learning models for prediction, classification, and anomaly detection. Strong foundation in supervised and unsupervised learning, feature engineering, and evaluation metrics.

name: Microsoft Fabric
description: Hands-on experience with Microsoft Fabric for unified data integration, analytics, and governance. Skilled in building scalable data pipelines and implementing modern data architecture for enterprise analytics.

name: Power BI
description: Proficient in building interactive dashboards and reports using Power BI. Experienced in data modeling, DAX calculations, and integrating SQL and Fabric datasets for automated reporting.

name: Python
description: Advanced Python user with expertise in data analytics, automation, and machine learning. Familiar with libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, scikit-learn, and Matplotlib for end-to-end data workflows.

name: React
description: Experienced in building responsive and dynamic web interfaces using React. Skilled in state management, component-driven design, and integrating APIs to create modern web applications.

name: Next.js
description: Proficient in using Next.js for full-stack development, server-side rendering, and SEO optimization. Experienced in building scalable web applications with modern deployment workflows (Vercel).

name: Statistics
description: Strong understanding of statistical theory, hypothesis testing, and regression analysis. Applied statistical methods for data-driven research and risk modeling in financial and academic contexts.

name: AI Alignment
description: Interested in AI safety, interpretability, and alignment research. Focused on understanding how to design and monitor machine learning systems that align with human values and societal goals.
